title: 510 Card - All SGC50 or Better Partial Set For Sale
author: pgellis

posts.post_title: 510 Card - All SGC50 or Better Partial Set For Sale
posts.post_content:
Thinking about parting with my T206 collection.
510 cards. All SGC50 or better. Missing some of the bigger HOFers. Have the tough ones in SGC50 or better: Demmitt, O'Hara, Elberfeld, Dahleen, etc. Have all of the Southern Leaguers.

Will only sell as a lot. Not interested in breaking up. 

Email for spreadsheet and price.
[url]pgellis@comcast.net[/url]

Thanks.

Phil
Bumpity bump. Before choosing my auction house.
If you do end up splitting on the Southern Leaguers, I am quite interested. Either way,  best of luck!
hmmmm.....states that not interested in splitting up. So if he does I'll takes the northern guys , you get the southerns:cool:
funny when i saw his post i was going to say 'when is someone going to ask if he breaks them up...'

[quote name="pgellis" post=1549090]Bumpity bump. Before choosing my auction house.[/QUOTE]

Guess you no longer are thinking of parting with...looks like that decision was made..

My T206 collection is in the REA Auction that ends this Sunday.

I focused on centering while collecting this partial set over 11+ years (card by card).

It is broken up into 28 lots in REA

LOTS
348
368 thru 380
417
418
422

561 thru 567

REMINDER: PRELIMINARY BIDS MUST BE PLACE BY 12:00NOON EDT THIS SUNDAY!  GOOD LUCK
